_sText:
Well your_the_man_now_dog87 made a sexy tank model on a func_path.

so i said i would make it work and shoot stuff.

===== BASIC CONTROLS =====

left button, move tank
middle button, activate turret
click (while on turret) shoot
a + d (while on turret) move turret left + right
Right button move tank backwards.

(theres a second black button outside for video purposes as it can be quite hard to control/see from inside)
========================

<object width="480" height="387"><param name="movie" value="http://www.wegame.com/static/flash/player2.swf"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.wegame.com/static/flash/player2.swf" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="480" height="387" flashvars="tag=WoOtIn_HeNrY_Jonnys_working_tank"></embed></object>
========================

Comment and assess :P

Jon
